derivation: (Aramaic) a root corresponding to that of H8293 (שֵׁרוּת);
outline:
1. to loosen, abide, begin
    1. (P'al)
      1. to loosen
      2. to abide (from loosing girths for camp)
    2. (Pael) to begin, open
    3. (Ithpael) to be loosened
strongs_def: to free, separate; figuratively, to unravel, commence; by implication (of unloading beasts) to reside
